Ability_1_Description: Starts battle with +10 Speed bonus. Status effects last 1 less turn.
Ability_2_Description: Temporarily gains a secondary type for 3 turns.

Ability_1_Description: Takes turn first vs Script/Managed types. +5 Defense/SpDefense.
Ability_2_Description: Deals special damage. 25% chance to inflict Concurrency Bottleneck.

Ability_1_Description: Takes 50% less damage from memory corruption attacks.
Ability_2_Description: Increases Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage for 3 turns.

Ability_1_Description: All abilities gain +10% accuracy. +15% crit vs multi-type targets.
Ability_2_Description: Deals special damage. +25 bonus vs C++ and JS/TS.

Ability_1_Description: Heals 30% max HP and removes one debuff. 25% chance to gain +1 Defense.
Ability_2_Description: Deals special damage. 30% chance to inflict Data Binding Error.

Ability_1_Description: Deals initial damage + 25 delayed damage. 25% chance of Callback Hell.
Ability_2_Description: 40% chance each turn to gain +1 random stat. 10% chance to lose -1.
